title: Why Testing Your Well Water Every Year is a Smart Move
excerpt: Annual testing keeps your drinking water safe and gives you peace of mind—here’s why it’s so important for Iowa well owners.

title: Top 5 Signs It’s Time to Test Your Well Water
excerpt: Changes in taste, flooding, or a new baby at home? These are all clues it’s time to check your water.

title: What’s in Eastern Iowa Water? Common Contaminants You Should Know
excerpt: From nitrates to bacteria, learn what could be in your well water—and why testing matters.

title: How to Read Your Well Water Test Results (Without Freaking Out)
excerpt: Confused by terms like coliform and nitrates? Here’s a simple guide to understanding your results.

title: Well Water Safety Tips for Families with Kids and Pets
excerpt: Safe drinking water is especially important for little ones and pets. Here’s how to protect your family.

title: Local Resources: Where to Get Your Well Water Tested in Eastern Iowa
excerpt: From Johnson County to the University of Iowa, here are the top places to test your well water locally.
